### ConstantFoldInstOperandsImpl() {#ae6e1699b7b98eaaf080f652b08792b9f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ConstantFolding.cpp&#125;::ConstantFoldInstOperandsImpl (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; InstOrCE, unsigned Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; &gt; Ops, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo">TargetLibraryInfo</a> &#42; TLI, bool AllowNonDeterministic)</>}>
Attempt to constant fold an instruction with the specified opcode and operands.

If successful, the constant result is returned, if not, null is returned. Note that this function can fail when attempting to fold instructions like loads and stores, which have no constant expression form.

### ConstantFoldSSEConvertToInt() {#a07d7324865c4b7d490acd0e24b361a97}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ConstantFolding.cpp&#125;::ConstantFoldSSEConvertToInt (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp; Val, bool roundTowardZero, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty, bool IsSigned)</>}>
Attempt to fold an SSE floating point to integer conversion of a constant floating point.

If roundTowardZero is false, the default IEEE rounding is used (toward nearest, ties to even). This matches the behavior of the non-truncating SSE instructions in the default rounding mode. The desired integer type Ty is used to select how many bits are available for the result. Returns null if the conversion cannot be performed, otherwise returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> value resulting from the conversion.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/constantfolding-cpp/#l02040">2040</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/constantfolding-cpp">ConstantFolding.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ReadDataFromGlobal() {#afcd344dd26b9b6b08fcb676d1c888bc8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ConstantFolding.cpp&#125;::ReadDataFromGlobal (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; C, uint64&#95;t ByteOffset, unsigned char &#42; CurPtr, unsigned BytesLeft, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL)</>}>
Recursive helper to read bits out of global.

C is the constant being copied out of. ByteOffset is an offset into C. CurPtr is the pointer to copy results into and BytesLeft is the number of bytes left in the CurPtr buffer. DL is the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a>.

### SymbolicallyEvaluateBinop() {#a4515378302b14f9df5b64311e4c84a80}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Constant &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ConstantFolding.cpp&#125;::SymbolicallyEvaluateBinop (unsigned Opc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Op0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Op1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL)</>}>
One of Op0/Op1 is a constant expression.

Attempt to symbolically evaluate the result of a binary operator merging these together. If target data info is available, it is provided as DL, otherwise DL is null.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/constantfolding-cpp/#l00787">787</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/constantfolding-cpp">ConstantFolding.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
